fn_l2addr_t Struct Reference
[L2 Functionality]

#include <fish.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t l2addr [6]

Detailed Description

The type definition for a fishnet L2 address.

This structure supports direct assignment (e.g., a = b), but not equality. Use the two provided macros to test for equality and validity.
